title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 6-1.4 - Amended Federal return
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 6-1.4 - Amended Federal return

State Regulations
(Tax Law, section 211(3))

Any corporation that files an amended return with the

Internal Revenue Service must, within 90 days (or 120 days in the case of a
corporation included in a combined report) thereafter, file an amended report
with the Commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
6-1.4

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
